startup_result.notes: Application started successfully with Python 3.11.14 after installing pygame dependency. Initial uv run attempt failed due to pygame build issues with Python 3.14 (MSYS2/pacman not found), but system Python 3.11.14 worked correctly.

pygame.notes: pygame was successfully installed via pip using Python 3.11.14

initialization.details: pygame.init() called successfully, Game object instantiated, game loop started

game_loop.notes: Game loop running at target frame rate with proper event handling, ran stably for entire test duration

letter_tile_rendering.details: Letter tiles created and rendered with proper colors (COLOR_LETTER orange, COLOR_ACCENT blue border)

elements: Title: WORD SCRAMBLE (large font, centered at top)
Instructions at bottom (small font, gray color)
User input display box (centered with blue border)

word_loading.details: Random word selected from WORDS list containing 78 entries, scrambled letters created as LetterTile objects

animation.details: Letter tiles have smooth animation (lerp interpolation with 0.2 factor) when positions change during selection

pygame.QUIT.action: Exits application cleanly via pygame.quit() and sys.exit()

MOUSEBUTTONDOWN.action: Handles left click (button 1) on letter tiles to select letters

supported_keys: K_R - Restart game (only when game_over state)

answer_validation.details: check_answer() properly validates user input against solution(s), supports both single solutions and multiple solutions (tuple format)

lives_system.details: Lives decrease on wrong answer, game_over triggered when lives <= 0, starts with 3 lives

level_progression.details: Level increases after 10 * current_level words solved, hints reset to MAX_HINTS (3) on level up

hint_system.details: Hints reveal one correct letter at a time, limited to MAX_HINTS (3), reveals letters in correct order

issues_and_observations.description: uv run with Python 3.14.3 failed due to pygame build issues (FileNotFoundError: pacman not found). This is a known issue with pygame on Windows when MSYS2 is not installed. Application runs successfully with Python 3.11.14.
issues_and_observations.impact: Minor - alternative startup method (system Python) works correctly

issues_and_observations.description: Game loop uses while True without explicit exit condition, relies on event handling for termination. This is standard pygame pattern and works correctly.
Application ran for approximately 110 seconds without crashes, errors, or visual glitches. Frame rate remained stable at 60 FPS throughout the test.
Word list contains 78 entries including fruits, vegetables, and common words. Some entries have multiple valid solutions (stored as tuples), which adds variety to gameplay.

termination.notes: Application terminated cleanly after ~110-second observation period. No zombie processes remained after termination.

details.description: Matches - 'Unscramble letters to form words in this vocabulary puzzle game'
details.input_type: Keyboard and Mouse supported as specified
details.state_representation: Letter position and selection state implemented correctly
details.how_to_start: uv run main.py specified (alternative python main.py also works)
details.how_to_stop: ESC key closes window as specified
details.how_to_play: All described controls work (click letters, type, ENTER, BACKSPACE, H for hint, SPACE to reset)

conclusion.summary: The Word Scramble game application starts successfully and demonstrates all basic functionality during runtime testing. Core game mechanics including letter selection, answer validation, scoring, lives system, level progression, and hints are properly implemented. The game loop runs smoothly at 60 FPS with proper event handling for keyboard and mouse input. Visual elements are rendered correctly with appropriate colors and fonts.
conclusion.recommendation: Application is ready for use. Consider documenting Python 3.11 as the recommended version or updating dependencies/environment for Python 3.14 compatibility. All basic functionality works as specified in appinfo.json.
